short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ensures that YouTube runs without any interruptions

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Works even after YouTubes new changes for handling AdBlockers. (June 2024)

Easier Volume Control:
- Adjust video volume by scrolling the mouse wheel up or down while hovering over the video.

Replay Button:
- Seamlessly replay videos with a single click. Use the keyboard shortcut "r" for quick replays.

Ad Skip/Closure:
- Automatically skip or close ads to reduce interruptions.
- Remove ad banners and promotional videos from the homepage.

Improved Autoplay:
- Faster autoplay due to the removal of the short countdown-delays between videos.
- Autoplay continues working in playlists beyond 100 videos.

Autostop Disabler:
- Prevent YouTube from stopping videos after periods of idle playback.
- Removes the "AdBlocker not allowed" popup. 

Cleanup Layout:
- Hide unnecessary buttons like miniplayer and cinema mode.
- Conceal the subtitles button when no subtitles are available.
- Remove action buttons like "Download" and "Clip", while ensuring the "Save" button is always visible.

Play All Button (*NEW FEATURE*):
- Adds a button next to the subscribe button on the channel homepage that starts a playlist of all the channel's uploads.

All these features are customizable through the extension's own menu, allowing you to tailor your YouTube experience according to your preferences.

Report Issues: Encountered any issues, problems, or bugs? Your feedback is valued! Please report them to ytu.bug.report@outlook.com.
